    • Method Detail

      • generateMonsters

        protected static void generateMonsters()
        Generate monsters. Add 2 MonsterWallThorn crossing the map center (where the KingFloor is) one vertical and one horizontal. Add 4 MonsterGhost, one in each quadrant of the map.

      • addWallThornMonster

        private static void addWallThornMonster​(Tile spawnTile,
                                        Direction direction)
        Add a MonsterWallThorn.
        Parameters:
        spawnTile - The tile where this monster should spawn.
        direction - The direction this monster should move in.

      • clearTileAroundMonster

        private static void clearTileAroundMonster​(LivingBeing being)

        Parameters:
